playerText: TM: May I have your ticket please ?

npcText: I'm not too sure, I just woke up with these in my pocket.
I'm a little tired to be honest...

playerText: You woke up here after a nap ?
npcText: I sat down to take a nap... and I woke up here.

playerText: Are you sure you weren't doing anything else ?
npcText: Yes. I took a nap and here I am.
